arcade.potts.vis

Class PottsColorMaps

  • java.lang.Object
    • arcade.potts.vis.PottsColorMaps

  • public class PottsColorMaps
extends java.lang.Object
    Container class for commonly used color maps.

    Uses Colors to define mappings.
